author: David Goggins
quote: It’s so easy to be great nowadays, because most people are weak.

author: Proverbs 3:6
quote: In all your ways submit to Him, and He will make your paths straight.

author: Seneca
quote: Associate with people who are likely to improve you.

author: James Clear
quote: You don’t need to be more motivated, you need to be more consistent.

author: Philippians 4:8
quote: Whatever is true, noble, right, pure, lovely, admirable—think about such things.

author: Marcus Aurelius
quote: When you have trouble getting out of bed, remind yourself: I am rising to do the work of a human being.

author: Epictetus
quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it.

author: Psalm 37:4
quote: Take delight in the Lord, and He will give you the desires of your heart.

author: Jocko Willink
quote: Get after it. Every single day.

author: Seneca
quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.

author: Romans 8:31
quote: If God is for us, who can be against us?

author: James Clear
quote: Be the designer of your world, not merely the consumer of it.
